data.actual_result: It rotates, as if it was just being closed as you scroll up. This doesn't happen 100% of the time, I got it to happen about 75% of the time.
data.expected_result: The arrow next to the category doesn't rotate, since it is already closed
data.short_description: Collapsed category indicator changes when it shouldn't
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that 1. Has a category at the very top and 2. Has many other channels below it, enough to scroll quite a bit. You can uncollapse other categories to make the list longer. - Collapse the top category. - Scroll to the very bottom of the channels list. - Scroll back up quickly and look at the arrow next to the top category. You are able to catch it rotating sometimes. - For this example I used DTesters by collapsing the information category. Depending on your roles, you may be seeing more or less channels than I am.
